Reviews.Title: Great cameras for the price
Reviews.Author: carissa
Reviews.Content: I was pleased with the product.  The daytime image is great but the night time vision isn't the best but it does the job. As soon as I get my lights up around the house it will work great.  For the price I paid I am pleased witht he product so far but its only been a week so we will see.
